room_title: Escape room "The Blizzard" by Complexity: A Puzzling Adventure in Hartford
room_description: You and your team of researchers are following the footsteps of a ground-breaking duo that made a remarkable discovery years ago. Your team is hoping to locate the area and the evidence, which will help to continue the initial study. During your trek to the research position a blizzard forms in the distanceâ€¦.. can you find the things you need to survive and continue your research before the storm arrives?
